content.stem: (audio) How many people will be in the group?

transcript.speaker: M
transcript.text: I’d like to confirm our dinner reservation for tonight.

transcript.speaker: W
transcript.text: Sure. Is it under the name Tanaka?

transcript.speaker: M
transcript.text: Yes, for four people at seven thirty.

transcript.speaker: W
transcript.text: All right, we’ll have your table ready.

content.rationale: The man says the reservation is for four people.
